name: TransportationInsecurityDiagnosesSNOMEDCT
title: Transportation Insecurity Diagnoses SNOMED CT
purpose:
(Clinical Focus: <insert metadata>

The terms in this value set represent the diagnoses associated with Transportation Insecurity as identified by the Gravity Project),(Data Element Scope: Supports the exchange of data for the Gravity SDOH Clinical Care FHIR Implementation Guide as well as other uses of this SDOH terms.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes SNOMED CT diagnoses that have been identified through the Gravity Project community consensus voting process),(Exclusion Criteria: N/A)

Transportation insecurity due to no driver's license (finding)

Transportation insecurity due to unaffordable transportation (finding)
Transportation insecurity due to route not serviced by public transportation (finding)
Transportation insecurity limiting access to food (finding)
